seo: 蓝凌EKP,远程命令执行漏洞,sys_ui_component,高危漏洞
seo_en: Lanxin EKP, Remote Command Execution Vulnerability, sys_ui_component, High-risk Vulnerability
summary: 该插件用于检测蓝凌EKP系统中sys_ui_component组件的远程命令执行漏洞，通过构造特定的HTTP请求来验证是否存在该漏洞并返回相关信息。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the remote command execution vulnerability in the sys_ui_component of Lanxin EKP system. It constructs specific HTTP requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability and returns related information.
